name: Marketing/Business data analyst
description:
Summary

A Marketing/Business analyst is responsible for building analytics workflow and preparing reports and dashboards. You will be making sure the marketing automation data is being properly collected and connected with other systems.

Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Plan and build BI and infrastructure to support company goals (CRM, reporting, marketing tools)

  • Setup data collection and tracking across different web and offline sources and ensure continuous data quality

  • Automate data management routine in compliance with global and local data protection requirements

  • Create and automate regular reports, dashboards, flow charts, and various data visualizations

  • Develop custom reports, as well as build and maintain key dashboards and presentations

  • Deliver and continuously improve the data-driven attribution model

  • Monitor and forecast marketing and sales trends, customers’ opinions, buying habits, and preferences

Key competencies:

  • 3+ years of experience of relevant work experience in marketing operations, digital and IT areas would be an advantage

  • Hands-on experience in marketing automation with Hubspot or similar

  • Experience handling data sets from multiple sources such as Google Adwords, Google Analytics, Facebook, Excel files, and databases.

  • Experience in implementing attribution models

  • Comfortable building reports in various visualization tools

  • Analytical thinker who is interested in evaluating data and making informed recommendations

  • Ability to quickly build relationships and communicate with cross-functional teams

  • Comfortable working collaboratively and remotely in a widely distributed workforce

  • Fluent in spoken and written English

We offer

  • Competitive salary

  • A fast-paced environment with challenges that enable you to grow as a professional

  • A unique chance to contribute to a socially useful project and an excellent opportunity for personal growth in the international educational organization

  • 100% remote work

  • Flexible schedule with alignment to Central European Time (CET) time zone.
